<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vigorous Health](/Feats.aspx?ID=1029) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well. Whenever you would gain the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don’t gain the drained condition.
name: Vigorous Health

Whenever you would gain the drained condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don’t gain the drained condition.
